rationale: The segment reports factual numbers ('Just over 130,000 chickens') and actions ('slaughtered and buried', 'exports... will be restricted') without using intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
statement_text: Just over 130,000 chickens at two farms in Mihara city will be slaughtered and buried, while exports in a 3km (1.8 mile) radius around the farm will be restricted.
